Posts.Content: Hello, I just found out I have breast cancer on July 25. My lump did not move and I knew something was wrong. I wish you the best of luck. I go see the plastic surgeon on this Friday and then I have the big surgery.
Posts.Title: Lump in right breast

Posts.Content: Hello, One thing I learned, if the lump does not move around, and it stays in one place, please get it checked out and I hope things go fine for you. Take care of yourself and try to stay positive.
Posts.Title: Lump in right breast
